Description: This registry defines Lenovo Extended Warning messages for Redfish.

CertificateMissing.Resolution: POST the certificate to the target resource and resubmit the request.
CertificateMissing.Description: Indicates that this operation failed due to the certificate missing.
CertificateMissing.Message: This operation is failed because the certificate in '%1' is missing while property '%2' states its requirement.

ReceivedUntrustedCertificate.Resolution: Stop accessing the HTTPS server and reset BMC to default if any security concern.
ReceivedUntrustedCertificate.Description: Indicates that the service has automatically received an untrusted certificate from an HTTPS server
ReceivedUntrustedCertificate.Message: In order to perform the operation, the service has automatically received an untrusted certificate from %1

LocalFileNotFound.Resolution: Provide a valid local file name and resubmit the request.
LocalFileNotFound.Description: Indicates that the operation expected a local file that specified in this request but one was not found.
LocalFileNotFound.Message: The requested local file %1 was not found.

UpdateSNMPv3Settings.Resolution: Update SNMPv3 settings of the account if need to access SNMP GET.
UpdateSNMPv3Settings.Description: Indicates that users need to update SNMPv3 settings otherwise the account unable to access SNMP GET.
UpdateSNMPv3Settings.Message: The SNMPv3 settings as well as SNMP user accessible interface for BMC user accounts need to be set otherwise the account won’t be able to access SNMP GET.

MissingSNMPv3Settings.Resolution: Update SNMPv3 settings of this account if need to access SNMP GET.
MissingSNMPv3Settings.Description: Indicates that this account creation request was missing SNMPv3 settings that would cause the account unable to access SNMP GET.
MissingSNMPv3Settings.Message: The SNMPv3 settings need to be set otherwise the new account won’t be able to access SNMP GET.

ResourceChangeRequried.Resolution: Perform the required change action on the specified component.
ResourceChangeRequried.Description: Indicates that a resource state change is required for changes or operations to complete.
ResourceChangeRequried.Message: In order to complete the operation, a resource %1 property %2 is required to change to be value '%3'.

LocalFileLocked.Resolution: Remove the condition and resubmit the request if the operation failed.
LocalFileLocked.Description: Indicates that the expected local file is being used by another one in an exclusive way.
LocalFileLocked.Message: The requested local file %1 is being locked.

AccountAccessIPMIDenied.Resolution: Reset the password to be less than 20 bytes if necessary to access IPMI with the account.
AccountAccessIPMIDenied.Description: Indicates that the account is unable to access IPMI since the length of the password exceeds 20 bytes.
AccountAccessIPMIDenied.Message: The account is unable to access IPMI since the length of the password exceeds 20 bytes.

CertificateInvalid.Resolution: Correct the certificate and resubmit the request.
CertificateInvalid.Description: Indicates that this operation failed due to the certificate failed on verification.
CertificateInvalid.Message: This operation is failed because the certificate in '%1' is invalid on verifying the certificates getting from '%2'.

LocalFileInvalidSize.Resolution: Provide a valid offset and length and resubmit the request.
LocalFileInvalidSize.Description: Indicates that the input offset or length for operating the specified local file was invalid.
LocalFileInvalidSize.Message: The input offset or length is invalid for this operation.

Name: Lenovo Extended Warning Message Registry
